paragraph.doNotSendRealEthOrTokens: Do not send real ETH or ERC20 tokens.

paragraph.instructionsOnBackingUpBackupPhase: Write down your 12 word backup phrase in the correct order.
paragraph.deviceRemovalConfirm: Please confirm that the details below are correct before removing device.

paragraph.privateKeyRevealedPurpose: Please use this private key in order to restore the wallet.
paragraph.doNotShareBackup: Keep it secure as it's the only way to recover your account in an emergency. Don't email or screenshot it.

description.activationBenefit: To send any token you need to top up Pillar Tank with PLR first

smartWalletIsNotActivated.title: Unique benefits of Pillar Payment Network for PLR users

description.singleTokenExperience: A single token experience including the ability to send/spend tokens you don’t already own through real-time swaps.

description.smartWalletActivatingStatusCard: Activating your Smart Wallet. It will be ready shortly.

smartWalletIntro.title: Welcome to the Pillar Smart Wallet!

description.intro: The Pillar Smart Wallet replaces the existing Pillar Legacy Wallet and features the following benefits:
description.recovery: It can be recovered from any web-connected device following proper set up.
description.accessToPPN: It provides access to the Pillar Payment Network including instant and gas-free transactions.
description.multipleKeys: It can control multiple keys providing for dapp-specific usage and spending limits.

default.title: To send assets, activate Smart Wallet first
default.description: You will have to pay a small fee

isBeingDeployed.title: Smart Wallet is being deployed now

description.waitingTime: You will be able to send assets once it's deployed. Current average waiting time is {{waitingTimeInMinutes}} mins.

error.needToSetupSmartAccount: You need to top up your Smart Account first.
error.default: There was an error on our server. Please try to re-activate the account by clicking the button bellow.

dataPrivacy.title: All your data is private
dataPrivacy.description: We care for our users' privacy. We don't support scammers. We need to make sure you're a genuine user in order to get rewarded with PLR tokens for inviting friends.

walletConnectAppsListExplain.title: What is it?
walletConnectAppsListExplain.description: A curated collection of web3 apps available to use with Pillar. Sign in without creating an account. Just scan QR and go.

moneyStream.title: Stream your money or receive streams with Sablier

description.forWorkers: As a worker, you see your earnings increasing in real-time in the Sablier wallet.
description.forOrganizations: As an organisation, our technology helps you get rid of the hassle of payroll admin.

description.empty: Add your email to be able receive special requests.
description.added: Verify your email and you will be able to invite your friends in Pillar.
description.confirmed: After changing email you will have re-verify it.

description.empty: Add your phone number to be able to invite your friends.
description.added: Verify your phone number and you will be able to invite your friends in Pillar community.
description.confirmed: After changing phone number you will have re-verify it.

walletConnect.assetNotSupported: This data transaction or token is not supported in Pillar Wallet yet

button.enableSmartWalletForTank: Enable Smart Wallet to create Tank

paragraph.introFirstParagraph: Stake PLR tokens in your tank to enable free and instant transactions between you and your contacts. PLR acts as a meta token allowing you to send and receive any asset that is supported by the Pillar Payment Network.
paragraph.introSecondParagraph: Draw from your PLR tank to send whatever you’d like.

first.title: Instant.
first.description: No waiting for miner or block confirmations. Seriously instant transactions.

second.title: Free.
second.description: No need to pay network costs or gas for any transactions.

three.title: Private.
three.description: Only final settlement is recorded on-chain. Batched transactions allow multiple transfers to be combined.

description.default: To start sending assets you need to activate Smart Wallet

activationModal.paragraph: To start sending and exchanging assets you need to activate your wallet.
activationModal.title: Activate Smart Wallet

paragraph.smartWalletActivating: It won’t take long. While activation is in progress, feel free to explore exciting features of Pillar Smart Wallet

exchangeActivation.message: To start exchanging assets you need to activate your Smart Wallet

paragraph.introFirstParagraph: Your new Pillar Smart Wallet is powered by a personal smart contract. This provides better asset management, security and recovery functionality.
paragraph.introSecondParagraph: Pillar also recommends that you transfer most of your assets to your Smart Wallet due to the benefits listed.
paragraph.walletIsActivated: You can now access your new Smart Wallet and the new Pillar Payment Network from the upper right and side of the Assets screen

title.smartWalletIsActivated: Your Smart Wallet is now activated

noBadges.title: No badges
noBadges.paragraph: You do not have badges yet

paragraph.agreeSharingInfo: I'm happy to share anonymous application usage statistics
paragraph.legal:
By sharing application usage statistics you are helping Pillar build a better wallet. 
Usage statistics do not include any personal information from you or your contacts.

community.title: Community
community.paragraph: Join Pillar community, subscribe to our newsletter to receive latest news, updates and more

linkedDevices.title: Linked devices
linkedDevices.subtitle: Assign your contacts as recovery agents for restoring the wallet

spendingLimits.title: Spending limits
spendingLimits.subtitle: Secure your funds by restricting larger transactions

subtitle.default: Smart Wallet account web recovery portal
subtitle.smartWalletNotActivated: Smart Wallet account web recovery portal (requires activated Smart Wallet)

paragraph.verificationIsRequired: Verification is required to prevent scammers' activity. We care for our users privacy.

paragraph.emailChanged: After changing email you will have to re-verify it in order to retain the ability to invite friends and get rewarded.
paragraph.phoneChanged: After changing phone number you will have to re-verify it in order to retain the ability to invite friends and get rewarded.

verification.error: That didn't work, please try again

paragraph.areYouSure: Are you sure you would like to delete your avatar?

paragraph.reward: You will receive {{reward}} for each friend installed the app with your referral link.
paragraph.enablingReferrals: To enable referral system we need to make sure you're a genuine user. We care for our users' privacy and never share your data.
paragraph.enablingInvitations: To enable invitation system we need to make sure you're a genuine user. We care for our users' privacy and never share your data.

title.incomingReward: Your reward is on the way

shareLink.title: Share your link
shareLink.paragraph: Invite your friends to join Pillar.

giveSmartWallet.title: Give Smart Wallet for free
giveSmartWallet.paragraph: Friends who install Pillar with your link will get free Smart Wallet activation.

paragraph.incomingAward:
Thanks for joining Pillar.
 To celebrate this, we also give you {{reward}}.
 You need to add and verify your email or phone in order to receive the reward.
 Reward will be issued to new user only.
paragraph.rewardMechanics: Your contacts will receive an invitation link. They will get rewarded with PLR tokens and a badge after confirming their phone number/email address. You will receive your reward after your contact has been rewarded.
paragraph.invitationViaPhoneRules: To invite via SMS, you need to verify your phone number.
paragraph.invitationViaEmailRules: To invite via email, you need to verify your email address.
paragraph.rewardForEachInvitation: You will receive {{reward}} for each friend installed the app with your referral link. You both should have verified your details in order to be eligible.
paragraph.thanksForReferring: Thank you for spreading the word about Pillar.
paragraph.rewardClaimingPending:
Transaction is processing.
 It may take a few minutes.
 You can check the status later here or in Home tab.
paragraph.rewardClaimingError: We can't verify your code at this time. Please try later.
paragraph.getBadgesForEachInvitation: Start receiving badges for friends installed Pillar with your referral link!
paragraph.allowedInviteViaEmail: You are now able to invite friends via email.
paragraph.allowedInviteViaPhone: You are now able to invite friends via text message.

label.referAndGetRewards: Refer friends and earn rewards, free PLR and more.

switch.title: Pay fees with PLR
switch.paragraph: Bye-bye ETH! After switch you will be able to pay transaction fees with PLR token. Never insufficient gas again.

verification.error: That didn't work, please try again

paragraph.allowAccess: Please grant access to your address book in order to be able to choose your phone or email contacts.

paragraph.purchasedTicketsEligibleDate: Tickets purchased today will be eligible for prizes starting {{date}}
paragraph.automationMissing: In order to join Pool Together you will need to automate transactions first.
paragraph.pendingAutomation: Please wait for Pool Together automation
paragraph.withdrawalNote: If you withdraw you will no longer be eligible to win prizes.
paragraph.allowAutomationWithToken: Allow Pool Together to spend your {{token}} and automate transactions for you. You will have to do it only once. All further purchases will be executed with no automation fee.

paragraph.allowanceMissing: In order to create a stream you will need to allow Sablier to send {{asset}} transactions on your behalf
paragraph.allowancePending: Please wait for Sablier allowance transaction
paragraph.newStreamInformation: You will stream a total of {{value}} {{asset}} for {{duration}} at a rate of {{streamingRate}} per minute
paragraph.allowSablierWithToken: Allow Sablier to send {{token}} transactions on your behalf
paragraph.cancelStreamWarning: If you cancel the stream, the money sent to the recipient will remain with them, and the rest will be returned to you.

promo.paragraph: A collection of dapps to use with Pillar

promoExtended.paragraph: Swap tokens on decentralized exchanges, lend & borrow crypto, play games and more

appDescription.zerion: A simple interface to access decentralized finance to invest, earn interest and borrow crypto assets.
appDescription.poolTogether: No-loss, audited savings game. Deposit Dai into the pool to get tickets. Each ticket is a chance to win weekly prizes!
appDescription.mooni: A simple solution to cash out cryptocurrencies in fiat to a bank account, without KYC.
appDescription.oasis: Trade, borrow, and save using Dai.
appDescription.binanceDex: Decentralized digital asset exchange from creators of one of the world's leading crypto exchanges.
appDescription.localCryptos: The world's most popular non-custodial peer-to-peer marketplace where people exchange crypto with each other. Buy and sell crypto on your own terms, using any payment method.
appDescription.asyncArt: Collect and experience programmable rare art.
appDescription.knownOrigin: Discover and collect rare digital artwork.

paragraph.finalFeeMightBeHigher: Note: a fee below might be shown as higher than provided on the connected platform, however, normally it will be less

exchange.title: Offers engine
exchange.description: Aggregated offers from many decentralized exchanges and token swap services

aaveDeposit.title: AAVE Deposit
aaveDeposit.description: Deposit crypto and earn interest in real-time

poolTogether.title: Pool Together savings game
poolTogether.description: Deposit DAI/USDC into the pool to get tickets. Each ticket is a chance to win weekly/daily prizes!

sablier.title: Sablier money streaming
sablier.description: Stream money to people and organizations in real-time with just one deposit

peerToPeerTrading.title: Peer-to-peer trading
peerToPeerTrading.description: Swap tokens directly with others. Safe, secure, anonymous

assetDecisionAlert.title: Please choose...
assetDecisionAlert.description: Would you like to buy PLR tokens, or other tokens?

paragraph.exchangeTransactionSuccess: It may take some time for this transaction to complete

smartWalletMissing.title: Enable Smart Wallet
smartWalletMissing.paragraph: You need a Smart Wallet to receive assets.

smartWalletIsNotActive.title: Use Smart Wallet account
smartWalletIsNotActive.paragraph: Please select your Smart Wallet account to buy cryptocurrency.

enableAsset.title: Enable {{asset}}
enableAsset.paragraph: Once enabled, it will be available for exchanging on {{providerName}}

intro.title: Exchange.
intro.paragraph:
Pillar Exchange or Offers Engine, as we call it, aggregates offers from multiple providers vetted by Pillar. 

Buy crypto with credit cards, Apple Pay or Google Pay. Exchange tokens in a few taps.

paragraph.ruleToGetExchangedTokensIntoSmartWallet:
Activate Smart Wallet 
 in order to receive exchanged tokens into

noOffers.title: No live offers
noOffers.paragraph:
Currently no matching offers from exchange services are provided.
New offers may appear at any time — don’t miss it.

deleteContact.title: Delete {{contactName}}

hideAsset.title: Are you sure?
hideAsset.message: This will hide {{asset}} from your wallet

logOut.title: Logout
logOut.message: After logging out you will not be able to log in back to this wallet without 12 words backup.

attemptToLogOutWithoutBackup.title: Logout
attemptToLogOutWithoutBackup.message: You can logout only after securing your 12 words backup phrase.

addressIsNotOnPillarNetwork.title: This address is not on Pillar Network
addressIsNotOnPillarNetwork.message: Invite it's owner to install Pillar wallet in order to be able to send instant transactions for free or switch to Ethereum Mainnet to send regular transaction.

removeConnectedDevice.title: Are you sure?
removeConnectedDevice.message:
You are going to remove the link between this device and your account.

Please make sure you have all your funds backed up.
